org.microbean.helm.maven

Class UninstallReleaseMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractHelmMojo
        • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractReleaseMojo
          • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
            • org.microbean.helm.maven.UninstallReleaseMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    @Mojo(name="uninstall")
public class UninstallReleaseMojo
extends AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
    Uninstalls a release.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        protected void execute(Callable<ReleaseManager> releaseManagerCallable)
                throws Exception
        Performs a release-oriented task using a ReleaseManager available from the supplied Callable.

        This implementation uninstalls the release with the supplied release name.

        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractReleaseMojo
        Parameters:
        releaseManagerCallable - the Callable that will provide a ReleaseManager; must not be null
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs

      • getPurge

        public boolean getPurge()
        Returns whether the release being uninstalled should be purged entirely instead of being marked as deleted.
        Returns:
        true if the release being uninstalled should be purged entirely instead of being marked as deleted; false if it should be marked as deleted
        See Also:
        setPurge(boolean)

      • setPurge

        public void setPurge(boolean purge)
        Sets whether the release being uninstalled should be purged entirely instead of being marked as deleted.
